name: Soldier
description: You fought in wars or border skirmishes, standing in ranks with comrades. The habits of war remain with you.

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: Fellow soldiers and veterans recognize your rank and service. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses.

traits.text: I speak with the clipped tone of military discipline.
I am haunted by memories of war.
I judge others by their discipline.
I share stories of comrades lost and battles won.
I have a crude sense of humor.
I am always punctual and expect others to be.

ideals.text: Greater Good. We must protect those who cannot fight.
Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace tyranny.
Nation. My country, right or wrong.
Live and Let Live. I've seen enough death.
Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins.

bonds.text: I will never forget who saved my life on the battlefield.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made.
I still serve my old commander in spirit.
I would lay down my life for the soldiers beside me.

flaws.text: The enemy I fought still terrifies me.
I have little respect for those who haven't served.
I made a terrible mistake in battle that cost lives.
I drink to forget the things I've done.
